name: EA Racenet
description:
Racenet is EA's Racing companion platform for players to find and compete in leagues, connect with others, compare lap times, improve on-track performance and enhance their gameplay experience.

Racenet is compatible with all the latest racing titles from Codemasters and has the following features:
Time Trial Telemetry Analysis - dive into the data to look at your on-track performance and isolate the areas you want to improve, from braking points to acceleration techniques. You can compare your performance against your friends as well as any driver on the Time Trial leaderboard. Master the racing line and cross the finish line first.
In-game Stats - You total wins, podium finishes, number of laps driven, and so much more.
